title: Notorious eSports LF Top Laner P1+
body:
Hey guys, 

I'm **Vanguard** and **Notorious eSports** is looking for a new top laner to fill the position in the long term. We're looking for a dedicated and passionate player to help us improve as a team and also for them to be improving along with us as we make our journey into the **SumSoc Circuit** and hopefully into bigger things next year also.

A little bit about myself is that I'm a 6-7 year LoL player who's been in multiple teams over the years and i've been dedicated to this game ever since I started playing it with the passion to go pro one day and I hope to bring 4 other players with me.

As little as I have to say, **Notorious eSports** is the top team in SumSoc with a guaranteed spot into the circuit so we're looking to take a top laner all the way to first place who can compete with high level players.

https://goo.gl/forms/kE5undGpcn2YH9Xo1


Thank you for reading,

Joshua "Vanguard" Rainbow-Muller

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Hi There,

I'm interested in trying out for this position, current details;

-Diamond 5 top laner
-Took a break after s4 but was previous D1 in both s3-4
-Diverse range of champs (anything from Tanks to carries)
-In game name; Gennai

please add me in game on that or just respond here on how I look at joining if you're interested!
